On May 20, 2007, at 12:41 PM, afcarl2 wrote:

> The following is a proposed generalization of the HyperNEAT concept
> from its present implementation.

Whereas the HyperNEAT papers were pretty straightforward and easy to  
understand, this actually made me a little bit dizzy.  I'm not sure I  
see the value in it; however, I'll try to spend some time attempting  
to understand what you're saying.

--Steve
--Apple-Mail-2--476060319
